Description: 
------------------- 
Downloadable Content (DLC) for Fallout: New Vegas, which will take you on an expedition to the unspoiled wilderness of Zion National Park in Utah. Things get ugly when a band of Indians assailed your caravan. While looking for a way back to Mojave, you will be involved in a war between tribes and a clash between a missionary and the mysterious neocanaanita Burning Man. 

Installation: 
------------------- 
1. Decompress 
2. Mount or burn image 
3. Install (Requires New Fallout Vegas have installed) 
4. Copy content from SKIDROW folder to the installation folder 
folder and overwrite 
5. Play
